travel: ${name} is driving to visit ${possessive} grandparents who live in another city. If ${subject} drives at a steady speed of ${speed} miles per hour, and the trip takes ${hours} hours, how many miles away do ${possessive} grandparents live?

For the summer road trip, ${name} plans to drive ${possessive} car at ${speed} miles per hour. If ${subject} drives for ${hours} hours before stopping for lunch, how many miles will ${subject} have traveled?
${name} is taking a long-distance bus that travels at an average speed of ${speed} kilometers per hour. If the bus ride lasts ${hours} hours, what is the total distance of the journey in kilometers?
A train departs from the station traveling at ${speed} miles per hour on its route to the next city. The journey takes ${hours} hours to complete. How far apart are the two cities?
${name} decides to cycle to the beach, maintaining a speed of ${speed} kilometers per hour. The ride takes ${hours} hours in total. How many kilometers is the beach from ${possessive} home?
During ${possessive} vacation, ${name} rents a car and drives at ${speed} miles per hour along the scenic coastal highway. After driving for ${hours} hours, how many miles has ${subject} covered?
round_trip: ${name} drives to the store at ${speed} miles per hour. The drive takes ${hours} hours one way. If ${subject} makes the same trip back home at the same speed, how many miles does ${subject} drive in total for the round trip?

The school bus travels at ${speed} kilometers per hour. It takes ${hours} hours to reach the school from ${name}'s house. How many kilometers does ${name} travel going to school and back home each day?
comparison: ${name} and ${possessive} friend both start from the same point traveling in the same direction. ${name} drives at ${speed} miles per hour for ${hours} hours. How far has ${subject} traveled?
Two delivery trucks leave the warehouse at the same time. The first truck travels at ${speed} miles per hour. After ${hours} hours, how far from the warehouse is the first truck?
gsm8k_style: ${name}'s ship can travel at ${speed} miles per hour. ${subj} is sailing from 1 to ${hours_plus_1} PM. How many miles can ${subject} travel?
${name} drives ${possessive} car at ${speed} kilometers per hour on the highway. ${subj} started driving at noon and stopped at ${hours} PM. How many kilometers did ${subject} drive?
A boat travels at ${speed} miles per hour across the lake. The journey takes ${hours} hours to complete. How far apart are the two shores?
${name} is biking to ${possessive} friend's house at ${speed} miles per hour. If ${subject} left at 2 PM and arrived at ${hours_plus_2} PM, how far away does ${possessive} friend live?
The train from ${place1} to ${place2} travels at ${speed} kilometers per hour. If the trip takes ${hours} hours, what is the distance between the two cities?
${name} walks to the park at a speed of ${speed} kilometers per hour. The walk takes ${hours} hours. How far is the park from ${possessive} house?
